mapper.select: select m.id, m.name,m.point, case when m.rank = 1 then '패밀리' when m.rank = 2 then '실버' when m.rank = 3 then '골드' when m.rank = 4 then 'VIP' end as stringrank, c.couponnum from coupon c inner join member m on c.id = m.id where c.id=#{param1}
select tid, orderid, sname, paynum, totprice, payendtime, snum, case when paystate = 1 then '결재완료' when paystate = 0 then '환불완료' end as paystate from payinfo where id=#{param1} and paystate=1
select tid, orderid, sname, paynum, totprice, payendtime, payment, case when paystate = 1 then '결재완료' when paystate = 0 then '환불완료' end as paystate from payinfo
select id,pw,name,tel,email,pid,address, case when rank = 1 then '패밀리' when rank = 2 then '실버' when rank = 3 then '골드' when rank = 4 then 'VIP' end as stringrank from member

select tid, orderid, sname, paynum, totprice, payendtime, case when paystate = 1 then '결재완료' when paystate = 0 then '환불완료' end as paystate from payinfo where id = #{param1} and payendtime >= to_date(add_months(sysdate, -1))
select tid, orderid, sname, paynum, totprice, payendtime, case when paystate = 1 then '결재완료' when paystate = 0 then '환불완료' end as paystate from payinfo where id=#{param1} and paystate=0
select tid, orderid, sname, paynum, totprice, payendtime, payment, case when paystate = 1 then '결재완료' when paystate = 0 then '환불완료' end as paystate from payinfo where paystate=0
select * from product where snum=#{param1} and sname=#{param2}
select id,btitle,bcontent,bpicture,to_char(bdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')bdate,productrank from productreview where snum=#{param1} and sname=#{param2}
select * from ( select * from product where best=1 order by dbms_random.random ) where rownum <= 5
select pid from member where id IN ( select id from payinfo where snum = #{param1} )
